concept.title: Pulse System Requirements
concept.shortdesc: Verify that your system meets the installation and runtime requirements for Pulse.

section.p:
The Pulse Web application has been tested for compatibility with the following Web browsers. Pulse may work with other operating systems and browsers upon which it has not been tested:
Internet Explorer 9.0.8112.16421
Safari 5.1.7 for Windows
Google Chrome 22.0.1229.79 m
Mozilla Firefox 16.0.1
Pulse has been tested for standalone deployment on Tomcat and Jetty.
